record.title: ORDERS FOR MONDAY, FEBRUARY 26, 2007

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until Monday at 2 p.m, February 26; that on Monday, following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved; and following the reading of Washington's Farewell Address, there be a period of morning business with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
